meanings.definition: A type of marine mollusk with a spiral shell.
meanings.sent1: The haliotes washed up on the shore during low tide.
meanings.sent2: Collectors enjoy finding haliotes along the rocky coastline.
meanings.sent3: The haliotes decided to throw a party in their shell homes.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts spiraled like the shell of a haliotes.
meanings.sent5: The children marveled at the intricate design of the haliotes' shell.

meanings.definition: The shells of these mollusks, often used for decorative purposes.
meanings.sent1: She adorned her necklace with shimmering haliotes.
meanings.sent2: Artisans crafted beautiful jewelry from polished haliotes.
meanings.sent3: The haliotes shells made a lovely sound when clinking together.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled like the iridescent surface of a haliotes shell.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the delicate scent of haliotes shells.
